marker.type: A home visiting program for pregnant and parenting women with a child below 5 and has a history of opioid use. Services include being matched with a recovery support specialist. Serves Sandisfield, New Marlboro, Sheffield, Mount Washington, Otis, Monterey, Great Barrington, Egremont, Alford, Becket, Tyringham, Lee, Stockbridge, W. Stockbridge, Washington, Richmond, Peru, Hindsdale, Dalton, Pittsfield, Hancock, Windsor, Cheshire, Lanesboro, Savoy, Adams, New Ashford, Florida, N. Adams, Williamstown, Clarksburg
